Dictionary.description: -- Definition -- Description of the semantics of the locator designator.

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Address identifier composed by numbers and/or characters.
Definition.name: addressIdentifierGeneral

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Address identifier composed only by numbers.
Definition.name: addressNumber

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Extension to the address number.
-- Description -- EXAMPLE E.g., in the Czech Republic a new address situated between two old addresses with numbers "2" and "3" receives a number "2" with an extension "a" so the full address number becomes "2a".
Definition.name: addressNumberExtension

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Second extension to the address number.
Definition.name: addressNumber2ndExtension

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Building identifier composed by numbers and/or characters.
Definition.name: buildingIdentifier

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Prefix to the building number.
-- Description -- EXAMPLE In the Czech Republic the building numbers can have prefix to distinguish between two types of buildings: "c. p." (descriptive number) for buildings of permanent character and "c. evid." (registration number) for temporary dwelling (e.g. holiday cottagesand garages).
Definition.name: buildingIdentifierPrefix

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Identifier for an entrance door, gate, or port.
Definition.name: entranceDoorIdentifier

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Identifier for a staircase, normally inside a building.
Definition.name: staircaseIdentifier

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Identifier of a floor or level inside a building.
Definition.name: floorIdentifier

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Identifier of a door, dwelling, suite or room inside a building.
Definition.name: unitIdentifier

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Identifier of a postal delivery point.
-- Description -- EXAMPLE A Post office box (P.O. box).
Definition.name: postalDeliveryIdentifier

Definition.description: -- Definition -- A mark on a road whose number identifies the existing distance between the origin point of the road and that mark, measured along the road.
Definition.name: kilometrePoint

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Address identifier related to the primary thoroughfare name in a corner address.
-- Description -- NOTE The concept of corner addresses with a primary and secondary thoroughfare name, each with an address identifier. Is used, e.g. in Lithuania and Estonia.
Definition.name: cornerAddress1stIdentifier

Definition.description:
-- Definition -- Address identifier related to the secondary thoroughfare name in a corner address.
-- Description -- NOTE The concept of corner addresses with a primary and secondary thoroughfare name, each with an address identifier. Is used, e.g. in Lithuania and Estonia.
Definition.name: cornerAddress2ndIdentifier
